about.title: About Me
about.description: Hello! I'm a passionate web developer with expertise in modern web technologies. I create responsive, user-friendly websites using various technologies and am always eager to learn and explore new tools to improve my skills.

items.title: HTML5
items.desc: Semantic markup, Accessibility, SEO best practices

items.title: Week 1 - Interactive Web Form with JavaScript
items.desc: An interactive web form that performs real-time validation using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, incorporating various input types and providing immediate user feedback through DOM manipulation.

items.title: Week 2 - Asynchronous Web App Development
items.desc: A dynamic web application that manages custom JSON data with drag-and-drop functionality. Demonstrates modern web development practices by combining data management, API interactions, and interactive user interfaces.

items.title: Week 3 - Portfolio
items.desc: A portfolio website that showcases advanced CSS techniques, including Flexbox and Grid layouts, while implementing sophisticated styling through pseudo-classes, pseudo-elements, and combinators to achieve a responsive and visually appealing design.

items.title: Week 4 - Country Management System with TypeScript
items.desc: A TypeScript application that manages and filters country information using object-oriented programming concepts, demonstrating TypeScript's type safety features through interfaces, classes, and type predicates.

items.title: Week 5 - Inventory Management Application
items.desc: A React-based inventory management application for a store that displays product details (SKU, name, quantity, and price) along with store branding.

items.title: Week 6 - Inventory Management Application (Update)
items.desc: An enhancement to the Week 5's assignments by adding detailed product pages with comprehensive information, images, and dynamic routing capabilities via React Router.
